field.name: summary
field.value: Transaction RespourceAdapter needs to implement IDisposable

field.name: description
field.value:
The ResourceAdapter of the NHibernate facility is not disposable but the resource that it holds, ITransaction, is disposable. When using the transaction service, AbstractTransaction may hold onto one of the ResourceAdapters. When dispose is called on the AbstractTransaction it attempts to dispose if its resources if they implement IDisposable.
I thinks this is the source of a connection leak that I have been trying to track down where the NHibernate transactions are not being properly disposed.
